actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from the Department of Interior and Office of Management and Budget.

official_title: A bill to authorize an amendment to a certain repayment contract for the Jensen Unit, Central Utah Project, with the Uintah Water Conservatory District, Utah, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a specified amendatory contract between the United States and the Uintah Water Conservancy District, Utah, which provides for part of the municipal and industrial water obligation which is currently the District's responsibility to be retained by the United States with a corresponding part to be controlled and marketed within Utah by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an amendment to a certain repayment contract for the Jensen Unit, Central Utah Project, with the Uintah Water Conservatory District, Utah, and for other purposes.
